[DQC.US.0004.9284] Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest with a value of 3,037,000 is not equal to the combined total of Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest and Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax ( 14,069,000 + -11,059,000 ) with a value of 3,010,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest fact are: Period :2019-03-01 to 2019-05-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest : -3 Decimals of Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax : -3
